trans-unit.source: Provides delayed resolution of security keys by resolving the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> only when cryptographic functions are needed.
This allows a key identifier clause or key identifier that is never used by an application to be serialized and deserialzied on and off the wire without issues.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyElement"></xref> class from the specified key identifier.
A key identifier that represents a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
A token resolver that can be resolved to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
securityKeyIdentifier is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyElement"></xref> class from the specified key identifier clause.
A key identifier clause that represents a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
A token resolver that can be resolved to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref>.
securityKeyIdentifierClause is .
Decrypts the specified key by using the specified algorithm.
The algorithm to use to decrypt the key.
An array that contains the encrypted key.
An array that contains the decrypted key.
Encrypts the specified key by using the specified algorithm.
The algorithm to use to decrypt the key.
An array that contains the key to encrypt.
An array that contains the encrypted key.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is asymmetric.
The algorithm to check.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the algorithm will be processed by the runtime as asymmetric; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this key.
The algorithm to check.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the algorithm is supported by this key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is symmetric.
The algorithm to check.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the algorithm will be processed by the runtime as symmetric; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the key size, in bits.
The key size, in bits.
